titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the disease of transverse myelitis occuring in a veteran within seven years from the date of the veteran's discharge or release from active duty shall be considered to be service-connected.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Provides that the disease of transverse myelitis occurring in a veteran within seven years from the date of the veteran's discharge or release from active duty shall be considered to be service-connected.
